snippet: The Kulturfest International Festival of Jewish Performing Arts plans to bring together theater and musical groups, filmmakers and other artists whose work explores Jewish identity and how it informs contemporary expression.
abstract: National Yiddish Theater-Folksbiene is planning Kulturfest: The First Chana Mlotek International Festival of Jewish Performing Arts for 2015; festival will bring together theater and musical groups, filmmakers and other artists whose work explores Yiddish culture and contemporary Jewish identity.
lead_paragraph: The Kulturfest International Festival of Jewish Performing Arts plans to bring together theater and musical groups, filmmakers and other artists whose work explores Jewish identity and how it informs contemporary expression.

headline.seo: Kulturfest International Festival of Jewish Performing Arts
headline.main: Festival Plans to Connect Jewish Arts
headline.print_headline: Festival Plans To Connect Jewish Arts
